text: mariyu varu nidrapotunnappatiki, nivu varini melkoni unnarane bhavinci untavu! Mariyu memu varini kudi prakkaku mariyu edama prakkaku maralince varamu. Mariyu vari kukka guhadvaram vadda tana mundu kallanu caci padi undenu. Okavela nivu varini tongicusi unte, nivu tappaka venudirigi paripoye vadavu mariyu varini gurinci bhayakampitudavai poyevadavu
